src:
Man of the Match Levante vs Barcelona: Jose Campana
03 Nov 2019, 00:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah comeback win spektakuler diraih Levante saat melawan Barcelona. Jose Campana berjasa besar di balik kemenangan ini dengan satu gol dan satu assist-nya.
Levante menjamu Barcelona di Ciutat de Valencia pada pekan ke-12 La Liga 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Sempat tertinggal oleh penalti Lionel Messi, Levante berbalik menang 3-1 dan memaksa sang raksasa Catalan pulang dengan tangan hampa.
Barcelona unggul lewat penalti Lionel Messi di menit 38. Itu adalah gol kaki kiri ke-500 Messi untuk Barcelona di semua kompetisi (total 609 gol). Namun, Levante bisa membalikkan skor melalui Jose Campana menit 61, Borja Mayoral dari assist Campana menit 63, dan Nemanja Radoja menit 68.
Campana sudah tampil gemilang. Gelandang 26 tahun Spanyol itu pantas dinobatkan sebagai Man of the Match.
Scroll terus ke bawah.
text:
Man of the Match Levante vs Barcelona: Jose Campana
Nov 3 2019, 00:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Levante won a spectacular comeback win against Barcelona. Jose Campana was instrumental behind this victory with one goal and one assist.
Levante host Barcelona at Ciutat de Valencia in Week 12 of La Liga 2019/20, Saturday (11/02/2019). Having been left behind by a Lionel Messi penalty, Levante turned 3-1 win and forced the Catalan giants home empty-handed.
Barcelona took the lead through a Lionel Messi penalty in minute 38. It was Messi's 500th left foot goal for Barcelona in all competitions (609 goals total). However, Levante can reverse the score through Jose Campana 61 minutes, Borja Mayoral from Campana assists 63 minutes, and Nemanja Radoja 68 minutes.
Campana has performed brilliantly. The 26-year-old Spanish midfielder deserves to be named Man of the Match.
Scroll down.
